live_updates: Power has been restored, and services are back online for most customers. Shaw technicians continue to restore services for a few remaining areas.

Our team is on site along BC Hydro for line repairs. Please follow this link for power outage updates: https://www.bchydro.com/power-outages/app/outage-map.html#outage=1778445. We thank you for your patience!
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
